nodes.text: The Great Election Day Debate was the day that Jagged Fel, Natasi Daala and Vitor Reige, all active candidates for the Imperial Head of State election, debated against each other shortly before the actual polling began. The event occurred sometime in 44 ABY and was seen by all citizens of the Imperial Remnant as a requirement.
During the debate, Fel announced that he was withdrawing from the race and endorsing Reige which allowed the admiral to defeat Daala.
